text: one of the issues about marijuana or
cannabis concerns edibles cookies
confections different food products that
contain cannabis edibles work
differently in the body the cannabinoids
that is the psychoactive components in
marijuana we metabolize them differently
when they go through our digestive tract
they take a little bit longer to come on
and when you smoke which is
instantaneous but they also last much
longer if you're going to get involved
with edibles start in a 5 milligram to
10 milligram of THC dosage range one of
the issues with edibles is that many of
them are strong in Colorado I went into
a store and I purchased a cookie and the
cookie was eight doses nobody on earth
eats 1/8 of a cookie
so it would be innocent enough to eat
the whole cookie and then be very very
very savagely stoned I don't really
think that's a great idea I think that
we kind of need to bring the dosing of
edibles in line with what people can
tolerate and don't say this muffin is
seven servings that's not the way to do
it remember you can always eat more
later but you can never eat less but be
careful and always keep edibles out of
the reach of children
[Music]
